# Database configuration (IMPORTANT: Don't commit sensitive credentials)
config.php

# Create a config.example.php instead for reference
# Users should copy config.example.php to config.php and add their credentials

# IDE and Editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Log files
*.log
error_log
access_log

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Backup files
*.bak
*.backup
*.old

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# PHP cache
*.cache

# Composer (if you add it later)
/vendor/
composer.lock

# Environment files
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local
